We Are
Stronger Together
Read More
Welcome to The Pathologist’s first partnership issue with ASCP! Why are we so pleased to bring you this collaboration? Read ASCP CEO Dr. E. Blair Holladay’s editorial to find out – and then read on to discover what else is in this month’s magazine:
  • Three different specialists talk about inter-specialty communication and why it’s important for pathologists to be open and collaborative with other healthcare professionals.
  • Ilan Danieli explores the health economics of liquid biopsy, discussing when to use broad NGS panels – and when not to.
  • Practical tips and tricks help residents and early-career pathologists focus on wellness, resilience, and burnout avoidance.
  • And much more: a mystery tumor, changing the public perception of pathology, the newest in mass spectrometry imaging, how readers got started in their laboratory medicine careers, and an interview with Cleveland Clinic pathology chair John Goldblum.
Click here to read the issue!
